Key Match Events: Zach LaVine and Coby White combined for 35 of the team's 63 points in the first quarter.
Chicago dominated the third quarter with a 41-17 advantage.
The Bulls shot 17-25 and went 10-16 in the paint in the third quarter.
Post-Match Reflections: The victory felt right to win despite concerns about adding wins to the board.
The game was crowd-pleasing with a final score of 139-126.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Jalen Brunson scored 26 points in the first half.
Karl-Anthony Towns added 17 points in the first half.
The game was delayed by 30 minutes due to a power outage.
